In addition, the Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance vide Public notice number (FT) /DEA/2O00 dated 9.8.2000 has notified some agencies for the purpose of grant of deemed export benefits. Accordingly, the Contractors either avail the excise duty exemption under notification No.108/95-CE or avail duty drawback under the deemed export benefits. 2.
